meanings.sent1: She prevalued the importance of kindness before meeting new people.
meanings.sent2: He always prevalues the effort his students put into their work.
meanings.sent3: The teacher prevalued the upcoming surprise test, much to the students' dismay.
meanings.sent4: The team captain prevalues the potential of each player like hidden gems waiting to shine.
meanings.sent5: Before the competition, she prevalues the support of her friends as a source of strength.

meanings.definition: To hold in high esteem or regard before others.
meanings.sent1: The artist prevalued his masterpiece before showcasing it to the public.
meanings.sent2: She prevalues honesty and integrity in all her relationships.
meanings.sent3: The cat prevalues its favorite toy, guarding it with great care.
meanings.sent4: The wise elder prevalues the knowledge passed down through generations like precious heirlooms.
meanings.sent5: Before the award ceremony, he prevalues the support of his family as his greatest achievement.
